name: Black Shuck
description: The Black Shuck is a large, intimidating fiend with an aura of malevolence, exhibiting a fierce presence that commands attention. Its fur is dark and unkempt, and its eyes gleam with a sinister intelligence.
memorable: Its ability to instill fear through its horrific howl and to curse its enemies makes the Black Shuck a unique threat that leaves a lasting impression.
goals: To hunt prey, instill fear, and spread chaos through its curses.
relations: Often associated with darker, chaotic beings and may be encountered alongside other fiends or undead creatures.
environment: Typically found in dark, eerie landscapes and around cursed sites, often in areas with water for its unique movement ability.
strengths: Immunities to necrotic and poison damage, as well as being able to move across water as if it were solid ground.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magical attacks made with silvered weapons.
attacks: Multiattack with three powerful Bite attacks that inflict piercing and necrotic damage, along with a debilitating curse and a fear-inducing howl.
most_powerful_ability: Curse of the Grave: Curses a creature from a distance, making them suffer disadvantage on death saving throws for a week.
senses: Possesses keen hearing and smell, giving it advantage on perception checks based on these senses.
skills: Expert in perception, allowing it to detect hidden creatures and ambushes.
additional_information: Blood Frenzy increases its chances of hitting weaker targets.
Immune to charm and fear effects, making it resilient against psychological manipulation.
Can utilize the Mist Stalker ability to remain hidden in dim light or mist.
Can inflict both physical and magical damage with its Bite attack.
Can frighten multiple creatures at once with its Fearsome Howl.
test_queries: fiend with a fear inducing howl
large dark animal with cursed abilities
